name: Baldis Basics Old Dool House
description:
This is my first ever Decompile that i made

If your wondering why there are two Files

The First File is Just the Normal Game.

The second File is is the Normal Game but some Things are changed like

 You are faster ,You can control Baldi and he cant Jumpscare you and you can shoot infinite B Soda.

The Sounds  were inspired By baldi´s weird basics and loud sounds and the Textures were inspired by baldi's basics the old laboratory

Rocket Voltic YT made the Sounds thats pretty cool

By the way some of the Sounds are very loud
